name: Cool Square Parkour
description:
A parkour game  in HUGE devolopment.

There is  currently 6 levels, and a bonus level.

 Unfortunately I do not have a mute button set up yet, so there's no muting the annoying music. sorreh :P 

You can check out my channel here: https://www.youtube.com/c/Che3syPlayz

And due to the fact that it's saying game is un-downloadable, here's the link: http://www.mediafire.com/file/d6yqkh1citgqspc/Cool+Square+Demo+0.3.rar
